scripts.predev: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(__dirname,'..','images','mocks');const dst=path.join(__dirname,'public','mocks');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dst,f)));console.log('Mocks kopiert:',fs.readdirSync(src).length,'Dateien')}else{console.warn('WARNUNG: images/mocks/ nicht gefunden')}"
